text: Melanie Papalia (born July 11, 1984) is a Canadian actress. She is known for her role as Dana in American Pie Presents: The Book of Love, as well as for her roles in movies such as Postal (2007) and Frankie and Alice (2010). In 2011, she starred as Pippa in the Showcase original series Endgame.Melanie Papalia at TV Guide She was born in Vancouver. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Actors from Vancouver
title: Melanie Papalia
